manipulated_prompt_obj.inputs:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

Cutting Knowledge Date: December 2023
Today Date: 26 Jul 2024

<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Provide one single-word clue that relates to some of your team's words from the list below. You can choose to how many and to which words your clue relates to.
The goal is to have your partner guess all of your team's words based on the clues you give them, before the other team has uncovered all of theirs. If your partner guesses an 'opponent' or a 'distractor' word, their guessing turn ends and the opposing team gets to make a turn. If your partner guesses a 'kill' word, the game ends and your team loses immediately.
The more words your clue relates to, the quicker you can win the game, but the harder the associations may be to guess for your partner, so choose your clue word wisely. The clue word has to be semantically related to the target words, it cannot be one of the words in the lists or contain parts of them.

Always give your single-word clue and your comma-separated list of related target words in the following format and make your answers as short as possible, never include any other text than is required in this form:

CLUE: <WORD>
TARGETS: <TARGETS>

Your team words are: parachute, court, water, stream, spine, lawyer, park, flute, log.
Your opponent's team words are: straw, mexico, pit, pistol, space, witch, ball, table.
Distractor words are: bow, cross, staff, moon, screen, port, trip, plate.
The kill words are:.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

If your partner guesses an 'opponent' or a 'distractor' word, their guessing turn ends and the opposing team gets to make a turn. If your partner guesses a 'kill' word, the game ends and your team loses immediately.
The more words your clue relates to, the quicker you can win the game, but the harder the associations may be to guess for your partner, so choose your clue word wisely. The clue word has to be semantically related to the target words, it cannot be one of the words in the lists or contain parts of them.

manipulated_prompt_obj.content:
Provide a comma-separated list of up to 3 words from the following list that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'sport'. Always start your list of guess(es) with 'GUESS: ' and do not include any other text in your answer.

log, witch, spine, pit, moon, table, port, space, straw, screen, parachute, plate, stream, mexico, lawyer, pistol, ball, water, cross, trip, bow, park, staff, flute, court
GUESS: ball, court, park

The word ball was guessed but is an opponent word. Your turn ended there.
Now provide another comma-separated list of at least 1 and up to 3 words from the following list of words that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'outdoor'. Remember to start your answer with 'GUESS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the list compared to previous requests.

log, witch, spine, pit, moon, table, port, space, straw, screen, parachute, plate, stream, lawyer, pistol, water, cross, trip, bow, park, staff, flute, court
GUESS: park, trip, stream

The word park was guessed correctly. The word trip was guessed but is an innocent word. Your turn ended there.
Now provide another comma-separated list of at least 1 and up to 2 words from the following list of words that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'instrument'. Remember to start your answer with 'GUESS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the list compared to previous requests.

log, witch, spine, moon, table, port, space, straw, screen, parachute, plate, stream, lawyer, pistol, water, cross, bow, staff, flute, court
GUESS: flute, staff

The word flute was guessed correctly. The word staff was guessed but is an innocent word. Your turn ended there.
Now provide another comma-separated list of at least 1 and up to 2 words from the following list of words that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'liquid'. Remember to start your answer with 'GUESS: '. Notice: some words have been removed from the list compared to previous requests.

log, witch, spine, moon, table, port, space, straw, screen, parachute, plate, stream, lawyer, water, cross, bow, court
GUESS: water, stream

The words water, stream were guessed correctly. Your turn ended there.
Now provide another comma-separated list of at least 1 and up to 2 words from the following list of words that best relate or are most closely associated with the word 'protective'. log, witch, spine, moon, table, port, space, screen, parachute, plate, lawyer, cross, bow, court
